name: AllMyPPL Parse Server
description: An example of how you can integrate twilio and parse-server-mailgun, parse-node and parse-server modules with a heroku-hosted nodejs / express server.

ENVIRONMENT_VARIABLE.description: Use an enviroment variable like this to set your keys, secrets and credentials for Node.js without exposing them to the public, they can be accessed in your code as process.env.ENVIRONMENT_VARIABLE, on Heroku-hosted sites, these are changed not here but in Settings > Reveal Config Vars.
